fixes.name: Book Level 1 NA IRD Title
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR distinctCount = DISTINCTCOUNT('Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Book Level 1 NA IRD])
VAR singleValue = SELECTEDVALUE('Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Book Level 1 NA IRD])
RETURN
IF(
    distinctCount > 1,
    "All Books",
    IF(
        singleValue = "NY Books",
        singleValue,
        singleValue & " Book"
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau COUNTD(...) to DAX DISTINCTCOUNT(...). Tableau ATTR(...) (returns a single value when uniform) is mapped to SELECTEDVALUE(...). String concatenation uses &. Logic preserved: when more than one distinct Book Level 1 NA IRD return "All Books", otherwise return the single value or append " Book" unless it equals "NY Books".
fixes.type_changed_reason: The Tableau formula uses an aggregation (COUNTD), so the equivalent should be created as a measure in Power BI.
